entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. A few flurries beginning late this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
